text: Then Jews from Antioch and Iconium came, and having persuaded the crowd and having stoned Paul,Crowds can be fickle, and the apostles had called their religion “useless”. Several days had elapsed, presumably, which gave them time to mull things over. There was probably some demonic involvement as well. they dragged him out of the city,He was probably dragged by the feet, like an animal. supposing him to have died.
